channel.title: Path of Exile in Open Beta
channel.description:
This weekend only though, but i get keys occasionally, so if anyone likes it, i can provide a key.
http://www.pathofexile.com/
Think: Diablo 2 except modernized with quite a few innovative and fun systems, and the biggest skill tree (forest) known to man (over 900 different ones iirc).
It's only like 2gb in beta as well, and their servers are fast. Can play up to 12 people in an instance, which means i need 11 more people to play with for massive rape!
Direct-download: http://www.pathofexile.com/downloads/PathOfExileInstaller.msi
Now... come join me and slay some monsters for that leet loot!
[img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/934145/poe.png[/img]

item.title: Path of Exile in Open Beta
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:26, topic:442032”][quote author=Niall link=topic=544682.msg3995177#msg3995177 date=1337175938]

I wonder if anyone actually bought the diamond pack

if I had the money I would, that diamond kiwi bird is fucking awesome

I have $1000 prepaid credits on my mobile phone, but I don’t think I would use the money for that (If I could)

well that’s assuming I had nothing better to spend the money on(read: living expenses)
[/quote]
Same goes for me next year, so I think I would transfere the money to my bank account.

PoE was a surprisingly good game compared to Diablo III (Beta)[/quote]That’s what all of us D2 fanboys say tbh, it took the direction that D3 really should have gone, the itemization is just brilliant!

Read full topic

item.title: Path of Exile in Open Beta
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:16, topic:442032”]Frell: No, unfortunately it will be F2P.

Speljohan: It looks like I will be able to play before the open beta closes because my VPS hasn’t been set up yet. Could you spare a key so I can try it tomorrow? If it is better than Diablo III (Something that wouldn’t be surprising), I will keep on playing it for a while.[/quote]Not “unfortunately” in this case, because they’re going the LoL-microtransaction path. They call it “Ethical microtransactions”, aka you won’t be able to buy anything that boosts your characters in any way, only vanity stuff.

I don’t have any beta keys at the moment, i will check around with the other people i know who have beta keys and see if i can’t get a bunch up here.

Read full topic

item.title: Path of Exile in Open Beta
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

[quote=“mopman_sucks, post:10, topic:442032”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=544682.msg3993327#msg3993327 date=1336915508]

ill download however I do not know how high my latency will be yet.
[/quote]They have an australian gateway.

unfortunantly does not matter when all traffic that leaves china mainland is trottled and passed through a censorship server but we will see.

give me a key regardless if i cannot play I will return the account you can give it to others[/quote]

What’s your average internet speed (local server @ speedtest.net)?

Read full topic

item.title: Path of Exile in Open Beta
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“mopman_sucks, post:10, topic:442032”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=544682.msg3993327#msg3993327 date=1336915508]

ill download however I do not know how high my latency will be yet.
[/quote]They have an australian gateway.

unfortunantly does not matter when all traffic that leaves china mainland is trottled and passed through a censorship server but we will see.

give me a key regardless if i cannot play I will return the account you can give it to others[/quote]Public beta this weekend, until tomorrow. You don’t need one.

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:9, topic:442032”]Is it better than Diablo III?
Other than a real ability to customize?
It is nice with a skill-forrest, but it is worthless if everybody uses the same tree.

FØKK THIS, I would need to resubscribe my VPS to play this. (Because of blocked ports)[/quote]Everyone starts on different points in the skill-forest depending on class, and you can have a maximum of 111 nodes, with 800+ available. I don’t really see cookie cutter builds ever showing up.

Read full topic
